message:
新功能

- web端多主题支持 #450
- Console端支持切换语言到英文

国际化

- git仓库README国际化 #436
- 文档站（docs）国际化 #438
- 官网（site）国际化 #443
- 后台管理端（console）国际化 #435

优化

- 默认主题simple内容丰富 #451

What's Changed
* Update README.MD by @liguohaocn in https://github.com/ikaros-dev/ikaros/pull/428
* Update README.MD by @liguohaocn in https://github.com/ikaros-dev/ikaros/pull/430
* docs: git repo i18n by @liguohaocn in https://github.com/ikaros-dev/ikaros/pull/437
* docs: add README-JP.MD by @liguohaocn in https://github.com/ikaros-dev/ikaros/pull/439
* optimize: github issue template by @liguohaocn in https://github.com/ikaros-dev/ikaros/pull/442
* Update Dockerfile by @liguohaocn in https://github.com/ikaros-dev/ikaros/pull/446
* docs: remove i18n jp readme-jp.md by @liguohaocn in https://github.com/ikaros-dev/ikaros/pull/447
* feat: I18n for compontent console by @liguohaocn in https://github.com/ikaros-dev/ikaros/pull/444
* feat: multi theme support by @liguohaocn in https://github.com/ikaros-dev/ikaros/pull/449
* optimize: enrich the simple content of the default theme by@liguohaocn in https://github.com/ikaros-dev/ikaros/pull/452
* Fixi18n by@liguohaocn in https://github.com/ikaros-dev/ikaros/pull/453


Full Changelog: https://github.com/ikaros-dev/ikaros/compare/v0.7.4...v0.7.5
title: v0.7.5
